sentences.sContent: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.sCn: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.sContent: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.sCn: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

sentences.sContent: ...Pursuing a career is an essential part of adolescent development...
...Given that invention plays such an essential role in our life...
...A whole fish is considered to be an essential part at most banquets...
...This base supplies the essential foundation for building skills...
...the first essential component of social justice is adequate food for all mankind...
...Energy Usage; Energy is an essential resource across the entire food production cycle...
...an essential skill in this era of multitasking...
...A good command of at least one foreign language has increasingly been an essential skill for us...
...for the obvious reason that caring for children is not only morally urgent but essential for the future of society...
...Chinese is an essential course for college students in China...

synos.tran: 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的

phrases.pCn: 原发性高血压；特发性高血压
基本营养物；必需营养素（essential nutrient的复数形式）
固有性；本质（essential quality 的复数）
知矿物；主成份矿物；基本矿物

remMethod.val: es ＋ sent(感觉) ＋ ial(…的) → 必要的感觉 → 必要的

words.tran: 重要性；本质；真髓；根本性

trans.tranOther: something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation
